text: "Daysleeper" is a 1998 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the leading single from their 11th studio album Up. It went to number 1 in Iceland, number 5 in Canada, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Belgium, number 12 in Norway, number 15 in Ireland, number 17 in Austria, number 18 in New Zealand and number 57 in Australia, Germany and the United States. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Peter Buck, Mike Mills, and Michael Stipe. title: Daysleeper
